title: The Future Is Now: It is possible!

organizer: Nadya Zhexembayeva, IEDC Bled School of Management

segmentation: So we are here.
We had a long event question for you.
How do you feel right now?
Tired, exhausted.
It's quite a lot to carry this kind of attention.
This event is designed with the future in mind.
This event is built on a hypothetical idea of having hypothetical billing doing hypothetical things that may or may not happen.
But the amazing thing that future is here, and it's now those magical moments of complete transformation and bringing jobs to Slovenia, bringing change to Slovenia happening all around us.
I moved to Slovenia in 2007 and being a Kazak American, that was a big surprise for my entire American community.
I had the same questions, the ones you just mentioned, Slovenia Doom in Slovakia.
There is no such country in Slovenia.
Where are you moving exactly and why in the world would you leave US?
To go to where?
Since my time in Slovenia and that's been out almost six glorious years, I've discovered amazing stories and they're happening every day.
Even this morning while I was preparing for this 5 minutes, I found one or two that I haven't yet met, so this will be as much a discovery for me as it is for you.
So this levinia that I know is Slovenia.
That is the best and the brightest, and that is doing amazing things.
Amazing things among the people that inspire me and Amanda.
Companies that inspire me is hidria that just a few months ago were named the European innovator of the Year 2012, 2013 only seven years ago.
Hidria had absolutely no product in green mobility and remember that is crisis years from zero to hundreds of millions.
He drew grew only in seven years and today every 6th European car.
Drives with headdress parts from scratch from nothing.
They built an empire in automotive industry among.
The companies and people I am inspired is also output Acuna that is a project that started only in 2013 and it started by a wonderful couple and the idea was simple.
We have amazing chefs or around Slovenia.
Why don't they all come and revitalize Ljubljana market?
And why don't they all serve their food every day during the week during the week, days and weekends so that we can all try their food?
But also that we can support this different restaurant sparkled and sprinkled all around Slovenia and less than one here.
They already have 50 chefs enrolled.
Now Slovenia, I know and the companies and people that inspire me also has Mateo.
Pull up who is sitting there and hiding himself.
Now that Edex story is amazing story on the global level.

If you just think the fabric of FedEx community that had 34 transformative events all run by volunteers done at the highest professional level, that is actually a training ground for some of the best event management I've ever seen in my life.
So now this entire community of volunteers are some of the best professional event managers.
And they just did it on their spare time as kind of free thing they want to do.
Among the communities, companies and people I'm inspired everyday is also driven varecia that is started in Maribor by two wonderful women and the idea was also very simple.
We have this abandoned courtyards.
Why don't we do something with them?
Why don't we build cafes in them?
Why don't we do events with them?
Why don't we use this empty spaces and do something with and?
I'm very happy that yesterday when that concluded in Maribor the Global Jumpstart meet, startup Maribor.
One, the Givat Varecia warned the main price because it is a remarkable community.
More than 300 events held in only three years.
This is happening today among the communities, companies and people.
I'm inspired every day.
Is also broken.
Park and hotel that launched in 2009 right in the middle of the worst depression and this hotel is not about having recycle your toilet towel.
Little message on the bathroom floor.
It is much deeper than that.
They spent 2500% less electricity for their lighting.
They have the most amazing water system that I've ever seen in Europe yet.
And it is for that reason that they've been chosen by The Sunday Times Travel magazine as the best non UK SPA.
They've received endless awards and then doing very very well.
This is happening right in the middle of economic crisis this.
Slovenia I know Slovenia I know is S project.
This is a project where unemployed and actually quiet in Venger youth of Slovenia comes to idle Sheena to learn how to cook and how to become professional chefs.
But they don't ask for donations.
They actually sell unbelievable smart product that have a story built in.
So people are ready to pay for the story.
People are ready to pay for S catering.
Because they know that when you hire as hate ring, you actually giving an opportunity for endanger used to become a chef in the future, Slovenia, I know.
Also is this love.
Challenge future community sitting here hosting the unbelievable community from Slovenia in this business forum.
This is a remarkable story of coming together and this Slovenia that I know today, not tomorrow.
I hope that this event will really inspire an move you to bring the future into today because living I know is already there.
You very much.
I think the whole team.
Then so I just want to ask the team of youth that also helped organize it and all the judges and the people who are moving chairs just quickly to get up and also the moderate Ersan everyone.
Just thank you so much for making this event happen alsia the judges everyone.
And big thanks for our host professor to couch it all the wonderful keynote listeners, all the sponsors.
This been a pleasure and I know there is a little bit of a reception and networking prepared for us.
Thank you very much.
Thank you.
